name: Mandurah Quest
description: Mandurah Quest badge. Black outline, pink and purple gradient background with the outline of two dolphins. One is a dark purple and the other is orange.

name: UWA Quest
description: UWA Quest badge. Black outline, dark and light bluee gradient background. There is a shadow of a graduation cap behind a sketch of two wine glasses clinking. The wine glasses are yellow.

name: Banksia Quest
description: Banksia Quest badge. Black outline, green and blue gradient background with a sketch of a banksia. The banksia is yellow.

name: Kangaroo Quest
description: Kangaroo Quest badge. Black outline, orange and red gradient background with a Kangaroo icon in the center. The Kangaroo is blue.

name: Koala Quest
description: Koala Quest badge. Black outline, pink and purple gradient background with a Koala icon in the center. The Koala is orange.
